result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on January 9, 2023 at 11:00 am.
from JRG (in person) 11/4/22, reset the hearings due to the 9:30 am calendar. Clerk informed Atty Sanders & ADA Schieffer the hearing will need to be reset and to contact the JA to schedule. eif
for Atty Sanders to appear remotely for 11/7/22 STC. To JRG for review. eif

3:13 PM Derrick Lee Plank appears in Court,  DA Halle E. Hatch in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court questions non-appearance, he moved and did not receive his notice. Court will QUASH THE WARRANT and reinstate the bond. DA Hatch will ask for a cash bond if another appearance is missed. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:17 pm.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 09:45 am.

from Ct Comm Gavic to Atty Sander's letter "The request of attorney Sanders is granted. Counsel for the defendant is to contact the court by 4:00 p.m. on Friday, 6-3, to re-schedule" And COC note "Clerk did not issue warrant so it does not need to be addressed on the record"
from Atty Sanders requesting the warrant be quashed and a new status be scheduled.

10:21 AM Attorney Derek W Sanders in Court.  ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Derrick Lee Plank not in Court.  Includes 16CM162 & 22CF55.  Set for Status at 10:15 AM.  Atty. Sanders: contact with Defendant today; he's at work.  State requests warrant, adjacent states, stay until Thursday at the end of business.  Court authorizes warrant.
Status conference on May 31, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Information filed with the Court. DE waives further reading of the information. NG. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 9:46 am.

9:31 AM Defendant Derrick Lee Plank appears in Court, Atty Derek W Sanders, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin.  22CF55 (PH) and 16CM162 set for scheduling purposes. Deputy Rick Huneke. S/T. Court reflects identification of DE. Cross Atty Sanders.  ADA Schieffer is requesting the Court find probable cause and bind DE over. The Court finds probable cause a felony was committed and binds DE over for further proceedings.  Status conference scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 10:15 am.

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on April 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Def from PCJ

3:08 PM Defendant Derrick Lee Plank appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Derek Sanders appears by phone, ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Includes 22CF55  and 16CM162.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Walker is requesting a $10,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of AS, no objection. Court so orders.  DE does qualify for PD. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:23 pm.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
